title: Set Up Digital Access
text:
All subscribers to New York are entitled to full digital access on nymag.com, including the Cut, Vulture, Intelligencer, and Grub Street, as well as on the New York Magazine app. To begin using your Digital All Access plan, as a new subscriber or a subscriber using the site for the first time, you’ll need to set up a digital log-in by creating a username and password.

How Do I Create My Digital Log-in and Link My Account?

Visit our Login & account Creation page When prompted by the log-in window, select the “Sign Up” option, not the log-in option. Enter your email address and enter a new username and password. Click on “Sign Up.”

Receiving a Notice That Your Account or Username Already Exists?

If you've previously commented on our sites, or had a subscription in the past, you may still be tied to an old log-in. Try resetting your password, and if you do not receive an email immediately to reset, please email us at support@nymag.com.
